user O O
defined O O
commands O O
. O O
INI O O
Parsing O O
tool O O
is O O
a O O
tool O O

which O O

in O O
certain O O
grammar O O

by O O
server O O
to O O

of O O

on O O

Language O O

MML O O
is O O
a O O
configuration O O
tool O O
widely O O
used O O
in O O
communication O O
equipments O O
. O O

uses O O

/ O O

architecture O O
. O O

server O O

with O O

the O O

in O O
the O O
equipment O O

system O O

the O O

of O O

Accords O O
, O O

which O O
are O O

on O O

and O O

in O O

is O O
to O O

create O O

that O O

regulators O O
can O O
use O O
when O O
creating O O
regulations O O
about O O

how O O
much O O
capital O O
banks O O
need O O
to O O
put O O
aside O O
to O O
guard O O
against O O
the O O
types O O
of O O
financial O O

risks O O
banks O O

practice O O

II O O

to O O

this O O
by O O
setting O O
up O O

and O O
